title: The Afto Crater
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:hansarp]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]]
[[>]]
**Upvote goes in, SCP comes out[[footnote]] Only sometimes. [[/footnote]]. Give it a try!**
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
[[=]]
[[include component:image-block
    name=http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/aftocrater/aftocrater.jpg|
    align=center |
    width=100% |
    caption=Dr. Orion gazing into the Afto Crater.
]]
----
[[=]]
+ Welcome to the Afto Crater National Park! 
++++++ (which is a completely normal national park. no funny business here. nope.)
@@ @@
++++ You must be here for our main attraction, the titular Afto Crater. Yes, yes, we know it's small. That's not the point here. 
@@ @@
++++ Hmm? What's that? Not a crater, you say? Well, technically this is //indeed// a hole, but we just call it a crater in hopes no one else will try to find a non-existent bottom that leads directly to hell[[footnote]] The Satan hell. [[/footnote]].
@@ @@
++++ Yes, you heard me right, hell[[footnote]] Could also be the Norse Hel. idk [[/footnote]]. Wait, what are you doing?
@@ @@
++ DON'T GO DOWN THAT HOLE!
@@ @@
++++++ Goddamn it, that's the fifth one this week. I really gotta get to work on that high fence.
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
//(Imagine yourself falling for about 12 seconds. Please. We're low on budget right now.)//
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
+ Hey. 
@@ @@
++++ You're finally awake. 
@@ @@
++++ You were trying to skydive to hell, right? Fell onto that ledge right there, same as me.
@@ @@
++++ Who am I? Why, I'm the gift shop owner, of course.
@@ @@
[[div class="scp-image-block block-center" style="max-width:300px;"]]
[[image aftokrator_icon.png width="250px"]]
[[div class="scp-image-caption" style="max-width: 300px;"]]
The Venerable Proprietor
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

**[[[aftokrator|The Afto Crater]]]**
@@    @@//"How'd you get in here?"//
[[module ListPages name="aftokrator"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
@@ @@
[[=]]
+++ Ask not why there's a gift shop a kilometer underground, but ask what other visitors have said about the Afto Crater!
[[/=]]
@@ @@
> "Afto is the most fish-like non-fish author though"
> = -- [[*User Fishish]], noble founder and coward traitor of the Fish Council.

> "Aftokrator is what is referred to as "based"."
> = -- [[*User Lt. Flops]]

> "Afto has absolutely no information on me possibly being a shady copper salesman from Ur and he needs to stop saying as much. signed, ð’‚ð’€€ ð’ˆ¾ð’¢ð’…•"
> = -- [[*User AriadnesThread]], who thought she was slick.[[footnote]] I know what you are. [[/footnote]] 

> "afto is my cool friend good job aftoðŸ¦…ðŸ¦…ðŸ¦…ðŸ¦…ðŸ¦…"
> = -- [[*User sugarush]], who is also very cool

> "Why is there a policy"
> "Also why is there a gift shop there"
> = -- [[*User psychicProgrammer]], who was never seen again.

> "I will not rest until afto and all his descendants die a painful and perpendicular death"
> = -- [[*User ParallelPotatoes]] after I orthogonalized his son Jimmy. 

> "afto gets the placeholder seal of approval"
> = -- [[*User Placeholder McD]]

> "afto i'm gonna burn your house[[footnote]] I live in a hole?? In the ground?? [[/footnote]] down if you don't fix wikidot"
> = -- [[*User Fish^12]], context unknown.[[footnote]] This //used// to link to SCP-5257 but for some godforsaken reason linking to it breaks something in Wikidot's fragile soul and so prevents me from restocking my gift shop. [[/footnote]] [[footnote]] RIP (rest in piss) to the slot goblin that once inhabited 5257. You will not be missed.[[/footnote]]

> "aftokrator lives his life in a perpetual state of fucking around"
> = -- [[*User Liryn]], correct

> "aftokrator is a swarm of ants typing"
> = -- [[*User GremlinGroup]], also correct, don't tell anyone else.

> "@aftokrator bless you"
> = -- [[*User djkaktus]]

> " â€”AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAâ€” "
> = -- No idea who, they completely missed the ledge and went straight down. How rude.

> [[span style="font-family: Bahiana; font-size: 175%; word-break: normal !important"]]"DARAMWUL ALAM NANAHAGUARAN NASARIM ISTHOGHAN TUWUL NAHASUTHE NAMABRAN"[[/span]]
> = --  Bahungave XVII, king of kings, brother and son of lost Daramwul[[footnote]] Y'know I never really did figure out what this guy's deal was. [[/footnote]] (c. 1385 BCE)
@@ @@

+++ Well, many thanks for your patronage. Have a pleasant journey!
@@ @@
//As you speed down the increasingly warmer one-way elevator to hell clad in an inflatable reflective Among Us costume, you notice several bright panels whizzing past seconds before you pass out from heatstroke.//[[footnote]] The Afto Crater Gift Shop takes no responsibilities for any damages incurred from reluctance to properly wear protective equipment. [[/footnote]] 
@@ @@

[[module css]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Bahiana&display=swap');

:root{
--white: 244, 244, 244;
--dark: 46, 14, 2;
--medium-accent: 212, 104, 0;
--bright-accent: 242, 133, 0;
--toggle-roundness: 0;
--swatch-text-light: var(--white);
--swatch-menutxt-light-color: var(--white);
--link-color: 242, 133, 0;
--visited-link-color: 189, 107, 0;
--borderColor: #ff8c00 !important;
}
#header {
     --header-h1-font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size)*3.25);
     --header-title: "THE AFTO CRATER";
     --header-title-mobile: "AFTO CRATER";
     --swatch-headerh1-color: var(--bright-accent);
}
 #extrac-div-1 span {
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    height: calc(var(--final-header-height-on-desktop)*0.3);
    width: calc(var(--final-header-height-on-desktop)*0.3);
    background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/aftokrator/aftokrator_icon.png);
    background-size: contain;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    left: calc(60% + 4rem);
    bottom: 1.5rem;
    transform: rotate(30deg);
    animation:shake 0.5s linear infinite;
}

#extrac-div-1:before,
#extrac-div-1:after {
    animation: spinning 5s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spinning{
     from {
     transform: rotate(359deg);
     }
     to {
     transform: rotate(0deg);
     }
}

@keyframes shake {
  0% { transform: translate(1px, 1px) rotate(0deg); }
  10% { transform: translate(-1px, -2px) rotate(-1deg); }
  20% { transform: translate(-3px, 0px) rotate(1deg); }
  30% { transform: translate(3px, 2px) rotate(0deg); }
  40% { transform: translate(1px, -1px) rotate(1deg); }
  50% { transform: translate(-1px, 2px) rotate(-1deg); }
  60% { transform: translate(-3px, 1px) rotate(0deg); }
  70% { transform: translate(3px, 1px) rotate(-1deg); }
  80% { transform: translate(-1px, -1px) rotate(1deg); }
  90% { transform: translate(1px, 2px) rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: translate(1px, -2px) rotate(-1deg); }
}


.scp-image-block {
border: none;
border-top: 2px solid rgb(var(--bright-accent));
border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(var(--bright-accent));
}

#page-title{display:none}

#login-status .printuser {
    color: rgb(var(--dark-accent));
}
 
#login-status #my-account {
    color: rgb(var(--dark-accent));
}
}
[[/module]]
author: Aftokrator
